title: SKT skins?
body: Hopefully the skins will be {{champion:150}} {{champion:60}} {{champion:13}} {{champion:15}} {{champion:12}} . But thats just what i think kappa{{summoner:31}}

replies.body: One of the skins was confirmed to be {{champion:58}} , Faker will likely pick {{champion:13}}  though.
Faker will probably choose Ahri, like he did last time, but he didn't get Ahri because she had a skin lined up. While he may not always use her, she is his favorite champion.
